innerAbility: Buff Duration / Chance to Skip Cooldown

pros: Decent mobbing with great burst damage capabilities
Great bossing capabilities especially against non-stationary bosses
Has a lot of innate %Ignore DEF from Skills
Has iFrames from Chains of Hell and Final Cut
Has lifesteal with Life Drain
Shadow Meld passive provides class with free 100% Crit Rate
cons: Can be squishy although class has high avoidability
Requires spending extra Mesos to buy [Dual Blade Training Book] from Taeha at the Secret Garden

baseStats: Excludes Hyper Skill Passives, Link Skills, Final Cut, and buffs with cooldowns
Dodge Chance: +30%
Crit Rate: +25% + (100% when Shadow Meld is active)

For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

extraContent.title: Dark Sight
extraContent.content:
Referenced from Nox and Fatalyz

Dark Sight can only ignore falling debris such as from bosses like Magnus meteors, Pierre hats, Vellum rocks, Papulatus falling clocks, and Lotus demolishers. There are several %Max HP attacks that can be ignored, for example, Magnus spin attack, Crimson Queen's DoT flame, and Damien falling yellow/red meteors

Other attacks that can be avoided include, Gollux reverse key bomb (debuff still applies but no damage or stun is taken) and Magnus stun smoke Most non-debris one-shots cannot be avoided. For example, Vellum's tail attack and head pop, Von Bon's orb projectile and Crimson Queen's flame breath

All direct endgame boss attacks such as Lotus, Damien, Lucid and Will are unavoidable

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Return
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Kerning City Back Alley when used.\nCooldown: 600 sec
details: Gained from completing the quest 'Return to the Secret Garden' Lady Syl at Lv. 20

primary.desc: While active, you cannot hit or be hit by enemies
details: Has a cooldown (3 secs, stacks up to 5 times) per attack dodged
You can use Flash Jump while in Dark Sight

primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice
Can be used twice in a row

primary.desc: Slashes forward at several enemies
Dashes forward while also pushing enemies back
Strikes one enemy with a barrage of attacks
Dashes forward while slashing
details: You will only dash forward when enemies are around

primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)
Dives down from the air at an angle
details: Attack has a chance to stun enemies
Can only be used in the air
Can be linked with or when Flying Assaulter is used first

primary.desc: Launches enemies in front of you into the air
details: Deals increased %Damage to enemies in the air

primary.desc: Throws a flashbang in front of you that debuffs enemies
details: [Debuff]: Reduces %Accuracy and enemy takes increased %Damage

primary.desc: Grants a chance for your attacks to apply a poisoning debuff
Dashes forward while slashing
details: You will only dash forward when enemies are around
[Passive]: Permanently increases the %Damage of and

primary.desc: Slashes upward launching yourself into the air
details: Pressing the Up Arrow Key and Skill Key together will boost you up higher

primary.desc: Pulls an enemy close and deals a deadly barrage of attacks
details: Attack is a guaranteed Critical Hit and has a chance to stun the enemy

primary.desc: Creates a clone that mimics your attacks, increasing the number of hits you deal per attack
details: The clone's attack deals reduced %Final Damage

primary.desc: While in , you can attack and use skills with a chance to not deactivate the buff. Additionally, when you are hit, there is a chance that will automatically activate
details: While in the automatic , if you dodge an attack that deals %Max HP, the cooldown does not apply
Additionally, you gain increased %Final Damage while in

primary.desc: Grants a chance to dodge incoming attacks. Whenever you successfully dodge an attack, you gain a buff
details: [Buff]: All your attacks are guaranteed Critical Hits and as well, grants flat Attack

primary.desc: Spin furiously damaging nearby enemies
details: Attack has increased %Ignore DEF

primary.desc: Stabs violently forward at a single enemy
details: Attack has increased %Ignore DEF

primary.desc: Dashes forward dealing devastating damage and provides a buff
details: [Buff]: Increases %Final Damage
Holding the Skill Key will increase the %Damage of the attack
You are briefly invincible after using Final Cut

primary.desc: Unleashes a devastating large attack that applies a damaging burning debuff
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect
[Passive]: Permanently reduces cooldown of

primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds
Creates a dummy that draws in enemy aggro and redirects some damage taken to the dummy instead
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Avoidability and %DEF
Can only be used when is active
Dummy has a set amount of HP
When the dummy is attacked, will be triggered
Increases debuff chance, duration, and %Damage
Can now be stacked (up to 3 times)
Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Final Damage

hyperActive.desc: Increases %Damage and grants your attacks the ability to deal an extra attack
Creates a torrent of slashes around you that damages nearby enemies
details: Attack has 100% Ignore DEF
You can move and jump while using Asura's Anger
Pressing the Skill Key again will cancel the attack

fifthMain.name: Blade Tempest
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, deals 1155% damage 7 times on up to 10 enemies, then deals 600% damage 5 times on up to 10 enemies in front of you for 10 sec, ignoring 100% additional Enemy DEF\nCooldown: 90 sec
fifthMain.desc: Unleashes a barrage of slashes in front of you
details: Attack has 100% Ignore DEF
You can move while attacking

fifthMain.name: Blades of Destiny
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500, Damage: 800%, Number of Attacks: 7, Chase Cut Activation Count: 5, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Enemy DEF Ignored: 30%\nCooldown: 10 sec
fifthMain.desc: Releases a flurry of blades all around
details: Attack has increased %Ignore DEF

fifthMain.name: Blade Tornado
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 750, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 1200%, Number of Attacks: 7
At intervals, Typhoon deals Damage: 800%, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Number of Attacks: 6. Activates whirlwind up to 6 times on 1 enemy.
For Spinning Attack and Typhoon, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +100%
Cooldown: 12 sec
fifthMain.desc: Releases a tornado forward that damages enemies it passes through
details: Attack has 100% Ignore DEF

fifthMain.name: Haunted Edge
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 750, Cooldown: 14 sec, all attacks of Haunted Edge ignores 30% of enemy defense\nHaunted Edge-Asura: Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 550%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Sword Winds: 6, Sword Wind Damage: 750%, Number of Sword Wind Attacks: 3, Final Damage of sword wind reduces by 50% when one enemy is hit by several sword winds\nHaunted Edge-Yaksa: Chase Cut Activation: 5, Max Enemies Hit: 2, Damage: 400%, Number of Attacks: 4
fifthMain.desc: Periodically, when using or , an additional burst attack will trigger
details:
[Sura]: Slashes around you and creates homing blade winds
  • Blade winds are unaffected by
  • Enemies hit by multiple Sword Winds, each additional Sword Wind deals reduced %Final Damage
[Rakshasa]: Slashes violently forward
Attacks have increased %Ignore DEF
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

meta: Dual Blade is a LUK thief class part of the Explorers class group. Unlike other classes, Dual Blade's 1st Job and 2nd Job is split into two different Job Advancements where you gain additional Skills midway through. Dual Blades have a special Job Advancement at Lv. 20 and Lv. 45
